title: Mori Studio - Ghibli Style AI Transformer
description: Transform images to magical Ghibli style or create new Ghibli artwork from text

pro.name: Ghibli Pro
pro.description: Fast Ghibli-style transformation with authentic Studio Ghibli aesthetics

max.name: Ghibli Max
max.description: Highest quality Ghibli transformation with fine artistic details

schnell.name: Ghibli Quick
schnell.description: Rapid Ghibli-style generation for quick magical previews

dev.name: Ghibli Dev
dev.description: Experimental Ghibli features for advanced artistic control

realism.name: Ghibli Realism
realism.description: Realistic Ghibli-style with photographic elements and magical atmosphere

anime.name: Classic Ghibli
anime.description: Traditional Studio Ghibli animation style with vintage charm

placeholders.textPrompt: Describe the magical Ghibli scene you want to create... (e.g., 'A peaceful forest glade with mystical spirits dancing among ancient trees')
placeholders.editPrompt: Describe how to transform this image to Ghibli style... (e.g., 'Transform into Totoro forest scene with magical spirits')
placeholders.multiEditPrompt: Describe the unified Ghibli transformation for all images... (e.g., 'Transform all into mystical Spirited Away style with magical atmosphere')

tooltips.guidanceScale: Higher values follow your prompt more closely, lower values allow more creative interpretation
tooltips.safetyTolerance: Content filtering level - maintains Ghibli's family-friendly spirit
tooltips.seed: Use the same seed to reproduce identical magical results
tooltips.privateMode: Your creations won't be visible to other users

errors.noPrompt: Please describe your magical Ghibli scene
errors.noEditPrompt: Please describe how to transform to Ghibli style
errors.generationFailed: Sign in to start creating Ghibli magic! Get 100 free credits instantly.

tips.promptEnhancement: Include Ghibli elements like 'magical forest', 'spirits', 'mystical atmosphere' for better results
tips.aspectRatioSelection: 16:9 works great for landscape scenes, 9:16 for character portraits
tips.modelSelection: Ghibli Pro for speed, Ghibli Max for highest artistic quality
tips.seedUsage: Use seed to recreate the same magical result consistently
